otherNames: Kaiketsu Jouki Tanteidan, Kaiketsu Jouki Tanteidan
synopsis: Steam Detectives stars a youthful detective, Narutaki, and his quest to uphold justice in steam-punk-like metropolis of Steam City. Along with his partners, nurse Linlin and mecha-knight Goriki, Narutaki faces a bizarre quandary of villains, and unravels a never-ending string of mysteries.
